Articles.Content:
We need some system allowing for simple urning on/off mods, especially parts mods.

One click and parts from specific mod disappear from list.

And next to every addon part shoudl be info what mod it comes from.

As most of the games, this will come more from the modding comunity than the developer themselve.

At the moment you have access to this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/13155-Win-With-Auto-Updater!-Kerbal-Space-Program-Mod-Manager

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ksp-mod-admin/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ksp-addon-manager/
I thought there was already a mod for that.

We need some system allowing for simple urning on/off mods, especially parts mods.

One click and parts from specific mod disappear from list.

And next to every addon part shoudl be info what mod it comes from.

Having the GameData folder already does this. It's not hard to delete a folder.
